DOC.brief_summary: The mian purpose study analysis image change 3.0T MRI lumbar small joint , intervertebral disc , ligament muscle hospital nurse first suffer low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Load Quantitative MRI Study Incipient LBP Patients .
DOC.detailed_description: Low back pain common clinical disease seriously affect quality people 's life . And disease take large proportion crowd . Incipient lumbago hard diagnose often hidden morbidity . If early symptom ignore patient , greatly influence quality life future . This study use 3.0T MRI distinguish difference lumbar small joint , intervertebral disc , ligament muscle normal pain . Firstly , recruit nurse low back pain one group , normal control . Then subject accept 3.0T MRI scanning time . Before scan determine MRI sequence make sure imageis clear enough . At last , analysis photo image processing workstation , reconstruct anatomical structure scan area . All find possible reason explanation occurrence incipient lumbago comparison two group ` image .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 18 27 year age 2 . Subject work nurse less three year continue work nurse le one year 3 . Back pain happen 2 time In past 12 month ( every time last 2 day ) , never happen 4 . Subjects participate study concern pain prevention currently next year 5 . According magnetic resonance inspection standard 6 . NO spectical low back pain serious disease system 1 . Subjects family history low back pain 2 . Subjects Suffering specific low back pain 3 . Subjects suffer serious somatic disease and/or psychic disease 4 . Subjects suffer chronic pain disease need longterm use drug therapy 5 . Subjects pregnant , plan baby 1 year le 6 month delivery 6 . Subjects suffer chronic cardiac , respiratory , liver kidney complaint symptomatically 7 . Subjects spinal operation
